Blackberry 10 Devices

Please note we cannot SIM unlock or fully debrand blackberry 10 devices in house

Flashing

  1. Open Z:\Blackberry\BB10_Devices and open the folder for your device
  2. Run the latest autoloader exe file for the device
  3. Connect the blackberry to the PC
  4. The loader should now detect the device and begin flashing
  5. Once complete you can repack the device

Blackberry Protect Removal

Please note this process will not work on phones running the very latest blackberry software, ensure you perform this process before flashing the latest firmware to a unit if it is required

  1. Open Z:\Blackberry\BB10_Devices and open the folder for your device
  2. Run the exe file which has DEVLOADER at the start of its name
  3. Connect the blackberry device to the PC
  4. The loader will detect the device and begin flashing
  5. once complete the device will boot with a code at the side of the screen like 0x2DE435AF2331EE this is should clear the blackberry protect account
  6. Now flash the device with the latest firmware by using its autoloader or chimeratool
